participant_1.background:
I love going to farmer's markets with my friends because we can explore new foods and find fresh produce.
i like crab dipped in butter.
I keep my clothes clean but my Renaissance Faire outfit is a special case.
I would love to have a pet dog but I can't because of my job.
when i m not touring with the band , i like to garden.

participant_2.background:
I love Asian food, especially spicy Thai food.
i am still single at the age of 35.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
i m saving up to buy a new camera.
i like to use candles instead of lights.

content.text: Hello! How are you?
Hello! I'm doing well. What about you?
Great! I'm just got back from the farmer's market.
Oh how fun! I love going to farmer's markets. Did you find anything good?
Yeah! I got some fresh produce and some crab legs.
Crab legs! Yum! I love crab. I'm a bit of a foodie.
Me too! I love exploring new foods.
What's your favorite food?
I'm not sure I could pick just one. I love Asian food, especially spicy Thai food.
Me too! I love Thai food. I also love spicy food. I'm pretty adventurous when it comes to food.
That's awesome! I wish I was more adventurous. I'm a bit of a picky eater.
Hey, that's okay! Everyone has their own preferences.
Yeah, you're right.
So, what else do you like to do?
I like to go to concerts. I'm in a band, so I love playing music.
That's so cool! What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock and pop.
That sounds awesome! I love live music.
Me too! It's so much fun to be able to see your favorite bands perform live.
Yeah, it is. I'm really looking forward to seeing more concerts this year.
Me too! I'm sure we'll have a great time
